cleaning.hero-subtitle: Give your vehicle a fresh start with our interior and exterior cleaning formulas. Impeccable results guaranteed.
cleaning.formulas-subtitle: Services adapted to all needs and budgets
cleaning.decontamination-subtitle: Remove contaminants embedded in the paint
cleaning.decontamination-desc: Mechanical decontamination with clay bar removes iron particles, tar, resin and pollution embedded in the paint. Essential before polishing or ceramic protection for a perfectly smooth surface.
cleaning.alacarte-note: Prices may vary according to condition and vehicle size
cleaning.intro-title: Why have your vehicle professionally cleaned?
cleaning.intro-text: Professional cleaning goes far beyond a simple wash. We use specific products and techniques to deeply remove dirt, stains and odors. The result: a healthy interior and a radiant exterior that enhances your vehicle.

renovation.hero-subtitle: Bring your bodywork back to life through buffing, polishing and long-lasting ceramic protection. Spectacular results on all types of vehicles.
renovation.services-subtitle: From simple buffing to 5-year ceramic protection
renovation.lustrage-desc: Buffing restores shine to your bodywork dulled by time. Application of a light polish that revives brightness without correcting defects. Ideal for regular maintenance.
renovation.polishing-desc: Polishing corrects micro-scratches, wash marks and paint defects. Two levels: 40% correction (light) or 90% (deep). Spectacular result guaranteed.
renovation.ceramic-desc: Ceramic protection offers a durable barrier against external aggressions. Exceptional hydrophobic effect, facilitates maintenance and protects up to 5 years.
renovation.ceramic-feature-1: 2 to 5 years protection depending on range
renovation.intro-title: Why renovate and protect your bodywork?
renovation.intro-text: The bodywork is constantly exposed to aggressions: UV, pollution, insects, tar. Buffing or polishing restores the original shine, while ceramic protection preserves it durably. Result: a radiant and valued vehicle.
renovation.benefit-1-text: Deep and lasting brightness like the first day
renovation.benefit-2-text: Shield against UV, pollution and bad weather
renovation.benefit-3-text: Beading effect: dirt no longer sticks

polishing.hero-subtitle: Correction of micro-scratches and restoration of your bodywork's original shine. Two polishing levels: 40% (light) or 90% (deep correction).
polishing.services-subtitle: Choose the correction level adapted to your vehicle
polishing.polishing-40-desc: Light correction of superficial micro-scratches and wash marks. Ideal for recent or well-maintained vehicles. Restores 40% of original shine.
polishing.polishing-90-desc: Deep correction of all types of defects: scratches, holograms, oxidation. For old or heavily damaged vehicles. Restores 90% of original shine.
polishing.intro-title: Buffing or Polishing: what's the difference?
polishing.intro-text: Buffing restores shine without correcting defects. Polishing actively corrects micro-scratches by removing a thin layer of varnish. 40% polishing is light, 90% is deep and corrects almost all defects.
polishing.final-cta-title: Ready to restore your bodywork's shine?
polishing.final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote according to your vehicle's condition

protection.hero-subtitle: Durably protect your bodywork against external aggressions. Natural wax (6 months) or ceramic protection (up to 5 years). Spectacular beading effect and simplified maintenance.
protection.comparison-title: Wax or Ceramic: which protection to choose?
protection.comparison-subtitle: Two solutions adapted to your needs and budget
protection.wax-desc: Natural wax offers effective protection and warm rendering. Ideal for regular maintenance and controlled budget. To renew every 6 months.
protection.ceramic-desc: Ceramic protection forms a permanent shield on the bodywork. Maximum resistance to UV, insects, tar. Exceptional beading effect and minimal maintenance. Guaranteed up to 5 years.
protection.ceramic-feature-1: 2 to 5 years protection depending on range
protection.elements-subtitle: Also protect wheels, headlights and plastics
protection.wheels-desc: Specific ceramic protection for wheels. Greatly facilitates cleaning: brake dust and dirt no longer adhere. Wheels stay clean much longer.
protection.headlights-desc: Polishing and protection of yellowed or tarnished headlight lenses. Restores original transparency and improves lighting. UV protection included to prevent yellowing.
protection.plastics-desc: Treatment of exterior plastics (bumpers, sills) tarnished or whitened by the sun. Restores the original deep black color. Long-lasting anti-UV protection.
protection.intro-text: The bodywork daily undergoes UV, pollution, insects, tar, acid rain. Wax or ceramic protection creates a barrier that preserves the paint, facilitates maintenance and maintains shine. An investment that enhances your vehicle.
protection.step-1-text: Washing and clay bar mechanical decontamination
protection.step-3-text: Application of wax or ceramic in several layers
protection.step-4-text: Respected drying time and final verification
protection.final-cta-title: Ready to durably protect your bodywork?
protection.final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote according to your vehicle and needs

aesthetics.starlight-desc: Installation of fiber optic starlight ceiling (Rolls-Royce effect) and customizable RGB ambient LED. Create a unique atmosphere in your interior.

aesthetics.intro-text: Customization reflects your style and adds comfort. Wrapping protects the original paint and allows selling without penalty. Equipment like starlight ceiling or heated steering wheel increase driving pleasure and vehicle value.
aesthetics.benefit-1-text: Vehicle in your image, different from all others
aesthetics.benefit-2-text: Equipment that makes every trip more pleasant

aesthetics-testimonial.1: Matte wrapping on my Golf GTI, incredible result! The rendering is perfect, impeccable finishes. Pauline gave very good advice on color choice.

covering.hero-subtitle: Customize your vehicle with full or partial wrapping, matte or glossy. Certified tinted windows for comfort and discretion. Protection and style guaranteed.
covering.services-subtitle: From partial wrapping to certified tinted windows
covering.total-desc: Complete color change with premium vinyl film. Matte, glossy, satin or chrome according to your wishes. Protects original paint and reversible. Lifespan: 5-7 years.
covering.partial-desc: Wrapping of specific areas: roof, hood, mirrors, wheels. Ideal to customize without covering everything. Trendy two-tone, de-chroming or sporty accents.
covering.intro-text: Wrapping allows radically changing your vehicle's look without paint. It protects the original bodywork against scratches and UV, and is totally reversible. Upon resale, remove the film and find the original paint: no non-standard color penalty!
covering.advantage-1-text: The film protects against scratches, gravel and UV
covering.advantage-2-text: Remove the film to find the original paint
covering.advantage-3-text: No registration card declaration or resale penalty
covering.tint-desc: We apply certified tinted films (minimum 70% transparency at front, 5% possible at rear). Heat reduction, UV protection and discretion. Anti-bubble guarantee.
covering.gallery-subtitle: Discover some examples of our work
covering.final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote and advice on finishes

covering-testimonial.1: Matte black full wrapping on my BMW. Exceptional result, perfect finishes even in recesses. The film is premium quality. My car has a second life!
covering-testimonial.2: Certified tinted windows applied quickly and cleanly. No more stifling heat in summer! No bubbles, impeccable application. Recommend with eyes closed.

steering.hero-subtitle: Add comfort and safety to your vehicle. Professional installation of heated steering wheel for optimal winter comfort and HD dashcam to protect your journeys. Compatible with all brands, invisible installation and guarantee included.
steering.services-subtitle: Quality equipment and guaranteed professional installation
steering.service-desc: Professional installation of heated steering wheel kit compatible with all brands. Fast temperature rise (30-60 seconds), several adjustable heat levels. Invisible installation with integrated wiring under the steering wheel.
steering.feature-1: Compatible with all brands and models
steering.info-note: Essential for winter comfort in the mountains
steering.intro-text: Heated steering wheel provides immediate comfort in winter, particularly appreciated in the mountains. Dashcam secures your journeys by continuously recording, providing evidence in case of accident or dispute. Two modern equipment that enhance your vehicle.
steering.benefit-1-text: Warm steering wheel in seconds. No more frozen hands in winter. Essential in mountains and cold weather.
steering.benefit-2-text: Continuous HD/4K recording of your journeys. Video evidence in case of accident, vandalism or insurance dispute.
steering.benefit-3-text: Invisible installation without visible cables. Compatible with all brands. Installation and operation guarantee.
steering.final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote. We advise you on the best equipment adapted to your vehicle and needs. Fast installation and guarantee.

steering-testimonial.1: Heated steering wheel installed on my Passat. Ultra-fast heating, invisible installation. Never again frozen hands in the morning in winter! Essential in the mountains. I recommend.
steering-testimonial.2: 4K front+rear dashcam installed. Exceptional image quality even at night. Clean installation, no visible cables. I feel much safer on the road.
steering-testimonial.3: Double equipment: heated steering wheel + dashcam. Serious and careful work. Both equipment work perfectly. Comfort and safety at the top. Excellent value for money.

dashcam.service-desc: Installation of Full HD or 4K onboard camera with night vision, G-sensor and parking mode. Continuous recording on SD card. Invisible wiring powered by battery. Front + rear dashcam option available.
dashcam.info-note: Secure your journeys and have evidence in case of incident

faq-steering.q1: Is heated steering wheel installation compatible with my airbag?
faq-steering.a1: Yes, absolutely. Our heated steering wheel system is specially designed not to interfere with the airbag. Installation is done under the steering wheel cover without touching safety systems. All checks are performed after installation to guarantee proper airbag operation.
faq-steering.q2: How long does it take for the steering wheel to heat up?
faq-steering.a2: The steering wheel starts heating in 30 to 60 seconds depending on the model. Optimal temperature is reached in 2-3 minutes maximum. You generally have 3 adjustable heat levels to adjust according to your preferences and outside temperature.
faq-steering.q3: Does heated steering wheel consume a lot of battery?
faq-steering.a3: No, consumption is very low (about 30-50W), equivalent to a rear window defroster. The system automatically stops after 30-45 minutes to avoid overconsumption. No impact on battery or alternator, even with daily use.

faq-dashcam.a1: Yes, the dashcam records in a loop on the SD card. When the card is full, old files are automatically overwritten by new ones. In case of impact (G-sensor), the current recording is automatically protected and will not be overwritten. You always keep the important moments.
faq-dashcam.q2: Does the dashcam work when the vehicle is off?
faq-dashcam.a2: Yes, with parking mode. The dashcam remains on standby and automatically activates in case of motion or impact detection during parking. This mode requires direct battery connection (installation we perform). Ideal for monitoring your vehicle against vandalism or parking accidents.
faq-dashcam.q3: Are recordings accepted by insurance companies?
faq-dashcam.a3: Yes, dashcam videos are increasingly accepted as evidence by insurance companies and courts in France. They allow clearly establishing responsibilities in case of accident. Check with your insurance, some even offer discounts for vehicles equipped with dashcam.

starlight.hero-subtitle: Transform your interior into a unique space with fiber optic starlight ceiling and customizable RGB ambient LED. Custom installation, magical atmosphere and total control of colors and intensities. Create the ambiance of your dreams.
starlight.services-subtitle: Custom solutions for a unique and modern interior
starlight.service-description: Installation of custom fiber optic starlight ceiling in the roof liner. Hundreds of light points creating a realistic milky way effect. Several colors and modes available. Custom non-invasive installation.
starlight.feature-1: 200 to 800 fiber optics depending on project
starlight.note: Replicates the effect of Rolls-Royce and Mercedes Maybach vehicles
starlight.intro-title: Why install starlight ceiling and ambient LED?
starlight.intro-text: Starlight ceiling creates a unique magical atmosphere, particularly popular in high-end vehicles. RGB ambient LED allow customizing interior lighting according to your desires and mood. Two solutions for a modern, warm and impressive interior.
starlight.benefit-1-text: Create a magical and soothing ambiance. Customizable "milky way" effect with hundreds of fiber optics.
starlight.benefit-2-text: RGB LED: millions of colors, adjustable intensity, dynamic modes. Adapt ambiance to your desires via remote control.
starlight.benefit-3-text: High-end equipment that enhances your vehicle. "Wow" effect guaranteed with your passengers.
starlight.final-cta-title: Ready to create a unique atmosphere?
starlight.final-cta-text: Contact us for a personalized quote. We study your starlight ceiling and/or ambient LED project to create your dream interior. Guaranteed custom installation.

starlight-testimonial.1: 600 fiber starlight ceiling in my S-Class. Breathtaking result! The effect is identical to a Maybach. My passengers are systematically impressed. Careful and discreet installation.
starlight-testimonial.2: Complete RGB ambient LED in my Audi. Magical atmosphere in the evening! I love changing colors according to my mood. Invisible installation, no visible cables. 100% recommend.
starlight-testimonial.3: Complete starlight ceiling + ambient LED pack. My interior is completely transformed! The atmosphere is unique, especially at night. Artist's work, perfect finishes. Excellent value for money.

led.service-description: Installation of customizable RGB LED strips in the interior: floor, doors, dashboard, seats. Millions of colors, dynamic modes, music synchronization. Control via remote or smartphone app.
led.note: Create the perfect ambiance for every moment

faq-starlight.q1: How is the starlight ceiling installed?
faq-starlight.a1: The roof liner is carefully removed, then we drill tiny holes to insert the fiber optics one by one. The fibers are connected to an LED light generator hidden in the trunk or under a seat. Installation is non-invasive and reversible. The headliner is then replaced without any visible trace.
faq-starlight.q2: How many fiber optics are needed?
faq-starlight.a2: It depends on the desired effect: 200-300 fibers for a light and discreet effect, 400-600 fibers for a realistic effect (recommended), 700-1000 fibers for a dense and spectacular "milky way" effect. We advise you according to your headliner size and desired rendering.
faq-starlight.q3: Does starlight ceiling consume a lot of energy?
faq-starlight.a3: No, consumption is very low (about 5-15W depending on number of fibers), equivalent to an LED interior light. Modern LED system is ultra-economical. No impact on battery, even with prolonged use. You can leave the starlight ceiling on without risk.

faq-led.q1: Can ambient LED be installed on any vehicle?
faq-led.a1: Yes, ambient LED are universal and compatible with all vehicles. Installation adapts to your interior: floor, doors, dashboard, seats. LED strips are thin and flexible, allowing to follow all contours. Wiring is invisible, concealed in existing trims.
faq-led.q2: How do you control ambient LED?
faq-led.a2: Via infrared remote (provided) or smartphone app depending on kit. You can change color, intensity, mode (fixed, gradient, pulsation, music synchronization). Settings are memorized: at startup, LED automatically resume your last settings.

faq-combined.q1: Can starlight ceiling and ambient LED be combined?
faq-combined.a1: Absolutely! It's even recommended for a spectacular effect. Starlight ceiling on the roof combined with ambient LED on floor and in doors creates a unique immersive atmosphere. We offer combined packages at advantageous rates. Both systems are independently controllable.

art3.p3: Services are invoiced according to Customer request and may vary according to vehicle type, condition and chosen options.

art4.title: Article 4 - Payment terms

art7.p2: After this deadline, the service will be considered as compliant and accepted by the Customer.

art8.title: Article 8 - Warranties

art8.p3: The warranty does not cover damage resulting from abnormal vehicle use, lack of maintenance, unauthorized external intervention or accident.
